node.title: Torrance Mall Shooting Sees Three Teens Gunned Down in California
node.alt: A stock photo of police tape. A shooting outside a mall in Torrance, California has left three teenagers wounded, including one in critical condition.
node.description: One victim is in critical condition after being shot in the head, while the other two are wounded by are in stable condition, police said.
node.content:
["A shooting outside a mall in Torrance, California, has left three teenagers wounded, including one in critical condition.", "At about 6.30 p.m. on Tuesday, officers from Torrance Police Department (TPD) responded to a call of gunshots outside of the J's Restaurant in Del Amo Mall in the centre of the city.", "When they arrived, police discovered eight shell casings in the parking lots outside the restaurant, as well as three victims. One was in critical condition after being shot in the head, while the other two are wounded by are in stable condition, police said.", "The Los Angeles Police Department said all three victims were 17 years old, and that they have all been taken to hospital.", "The TPD said suspects ran southbound before carjacking someone close to a nearby Dave and Busters diner off of Hawthorne Boulevard.", "TPD said the stolen vehicle was a small Chevy SUV and said that there could be at least three suspects involved.", "", "
A stock photo of police tape. A shooting outside a mall in Torrance, California has left three teenagers wounded, including one in critical condition.
"]
